summary: Immediately after the fall of communism in Albania, two Italians go there to embezzle investment money by creating a fake company. As the chairman/fall guy, they pick a former political prisoner who turns out to be more than meets the eye.
cast: Enrico Lo Verso|Michele Placido|Piro Milkani|Carmelo Di Mazzarelli|Elida Janushi|Sefer Pema|Idajet Sejdia|Marieta Ljarja|Elina Ndreu|Ilir Ara|Liliana Subashi|Artan Marina|Vassjan Lammi|Nikolin Elezi|Fatmir Gjyla|Elona Hoti|Besim Kurti|Esmeralda Ara|Luan Ujkai|Shkelqim Daja|Dritan Alia|Elinor Cekliqi|Ferit Nutai|Klodian Rakaj|Saimir Tila|Marian Tifozi|Gezim Nutai|Altin Garupi|Gezim Garupi|Ismail Kukaj|Nuredin Ujkaj|Julian Sands
title: Lamerica
